alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:56PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Coffee, northwestern Bacon, southeastern Jeff Davis and west central Appling Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 656 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Graham. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baxley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
